CustomField.description: If Completed Date is not null, Duration is Completed Date minus Start Date. If Complete Date is null then Duration is Finish Date minus Start Date.
CustomField.formula: if(ISBLANK(PDLM__Start_Date_Roll__c), null, if(!ISBLANK(PDLM__Completed_Date__c), PDLM__Completed_Date__c - PDLM__Start_Date_Roll__c, if(!ISBLANK(PDLM__Due_Date__c), PDLM__Due_Date__c - PDLM__Start_Date_Roll__c, null)))
CustomField.label: Duration
